thread.title: Quality Technology names Melanson as Chief Growth Officer

author: cnbc.com
title: Quality Technology names Melanson as Chief Growth Officer
text:
LARGO, Md., Mr. Gregg Melanson has joined Quality Technology Inc. (QuTech) as the Chief Growth Officer. Mr. Melanson will provide leadership for QuTech's strategic growth. He will provide the executive oversight of business development, proposal activity, marketing and communication.
For the past 28 years, Mr. Melanson has served in a number of operations, strategy and business development roles within the public sector. These roles include time at the Walt Disney Company, Sprint, PPC, Trowbridge and Trowbridge, CyberCore Technology, NCI and TGM Analytics.
Ms. Renee Parker, CEO of QuTech, stated, "We are excited to add Gregg to the team. His experience with growing small companies in the federal market is critical to our overall plan."
Founded in 1989, QuTech is an Information Technology company specializing in Cybersecurity, Data Center management, Cloud Computing, IT Service/Call Center management, Program Management and IT Consulting with Federal, State, and Local Governments. QuTech maintains ISO 9000 and ISO/IEC 20000 and certifications and Technology Business Management (TBM) expertise.
For additional information contact QuTech at info@qutech.com .
